title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2886/86 of 18 September 1986 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2793/77 on detailed rules of application for granting special aid for skimmed milk for use as feed for animals other than young calves
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2886/86
of 18 September 1986
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2793/77 on detailed rules of application for granting special aid for skimmed milk for use as feed for animals other than young calves
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the third indent of Article 3 (1) (b) of Regulation (EEC) No 2793/77, '175 grammes' is hereby replaced by '130 grammes'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 September 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 119, 8. 5. 1986, p. 19.
(3) OJ No L 321, 16. 12. 1977, p. 30.
(4) OJ No L 155, 14. 6. 1985, p. 18.
(5) OJ No L 323, 4. 12. 1985, p. 12.
